name: Billy looking for a soulmate
description:
Hello there! First of all, thanks for trying this weird game.

I'm the kind of guy who always want to make people laugh. It's probably my way of expressing myself. When I saw the theme, at first I was pretty disappointed, because I didn't know how I could turn it into something that represents me. Then I had this weird idea of making your own princess based on your inputs. Go play and create yours! Pay attention to the reaction of your friend at the end of the game. There are several depending on your score!

Controls:

- Arrow keys and A-B-X-Y

- Or joystick! (on the Windows standalone only: download it at https://arthurcousseau.com/unity/brackeysgamejam2/app.zip)

P.S: sorry for the bad graphics that do not really let you distinguish a pretty princess from an ugly one. I'm certainly the worst graphist in Europe. I hope you had a good time playing that thing, though!
